content:
Killing the Giant Mole
Requirements
Skills
70+ , , recommended
43+ recommended
92+
Items
  • Spade
  • Dharok the Wretched's equipment
  • Falador shield 3+
  • Kandarin headgear 1+ or other inextinguishable light source
  • Dwarven rock cake
Quest
None
Other
  • Falador Hard Diary to use Falador shield mole locator (required based on this guide)
  • Freeing the Mountain Dwarf subquest of Recipe for Disaster to use Dwarven rock cake, or the Locator orb from Dragon Slayer II
  • Kandarin Easy Diary to use Kandarin headgear light source, or Making Friends with My Arm to build Fire of Eternal Light
  • High to repair damaged Barrows equipment
Results
ProfitExperience gained
972,040 43,000 14,332 10,750
Inputs (182,560)Outputs (1,154,600)
3 × Super combat potion(4) (35,973)6 × Stamina potion(4) (31,392)9 × Prayer potion(4) (104,085)11,110 × Dharok's armour set (11,110) repair costs50 × Mole claw (365,750)100 × Mole skin (668,000)313 × Yew logs (60,313)11.72 × Law rune (1,535)10.94 × Death rune (2,034)99.61 × Blood rune (35,959)779 × Fire rune (3,897)820 × Air rune (4,102)2,695 × Iron arrow (5,391)0.39 × Rune med helm (4,339)39.06 × Iron ore (3,281)

The profit rate assumes 50 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.


The Giant Mole is a mid-level boss commonly killed for its mole claws and mole skins. These can be given to Wyson the gardener in exchange for bird nests containing rare seeds and jewellery. The Giant Mole always drops one mole claw and 1-3 (average 2) mole skins per kill, which can be exchanged one-for-one into birds nests. Bird nests are always in demand because they're the secondary Herblore ingredient to make Saradomin brews. An experienced adventurer can get around 150 birds nest per hour by killing the Giant Mole. As birds nests are quite difficult to get through other methods, the Giant Mole is the fastest and most popular source of birds nests in RuneScape, making it a great mid-level boss to kill.

The average loot per Giant Mole kill is 23,563. Most of the loot (87.7%) comes from the mole claws and mole skins. Giving these mole parts to Wyson the gardener in exchange for birds nests can be profitable.

Having the Falador Hard Diary tasks completed gives these two benefits:

  1. Noted mole claws and mole skins drops
  2. The Falador shield mole locator, which points an arrow on the minimap to the boss's location at all times.

These perks are essential and will boost kill speed from 20 per hour to 50 per hour. In addition, adventurers should bring an inextinguishable light source such as the Kandarin headgear 1+ or a Sapphire lantern. The Kandarin headgear is recommended as it is very easy to obtain.

Strategy

For equipment, adventurers should wear Dharok the Wretched's equipment with low Hitpoints to utilise its set effect of higher damage at lower hitpoints. A fast way to get to low hitpoints is to use the Dwarven rock cake from the Freeing the Mountain Dwarf subquest of Recipe for Disaster. Keep in mind that when camping low hitpoints, the Giant Mole can easily kill you so the Protect from Melee prayer needs to be enabled.

See the Giant Mole article for additional information.


Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.

These can be given to [[Wyson the gardener]] in exchange for [[bird nest]]s containing rare [[seeds]] and [[jewellery]].
